document.full_text: the daiichi nuclear power plant in fukushima is built on the shoreline in northeast japan. so when an 8.9 magnitude earth quake struck on friday, the tsunami waves it spawned -- as tall as a house and speeding like a jet plane -- washed right over the reactors and put them at risk of a meltdown.
document.title: special report: can japan find "new deal" after triple whammy?
lines_and_colors: the daiichi nuclear power plant in fukushima is built on the shoreline in northeast japan. so when an 8.9 magnitude earth quake struck on friday, the tsunami waves it spawned -- as tall as a house and speeding like a jet plane -- washed right over the reactors and put them at risk of a meltdown.
